overview: Chloe's life isn't what she wanted it to be. Wishing desperately that she could do things differently, Chloe wakes up one morning and quickly realizes that she's been given a gift, the gift of a second chance. By some unexplained phenomenon Chloe is given the opportunity to relive the day that changed her life for the worse over and over again. Maybe one of these mornings she'll do what's best and just stay in bed.
tagline: Time flies when your F**king Chloe!
title: Chasing Chloe
